changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.interval ( id bigserial NOT NULL, name character varying NOT NULL, description character varying, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, pinned boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, CONSTRAINT interval_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT interval_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT interval_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.interval (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.interval IS 'A interval is a time period or instant in the system. It defines placement, ordering and scheduling of actions, agencies, locations and productsw';
